replies.msg:
我都聽過
發下夢做老闆
點知做到老闆就發現啲客都好閪

If you're going to be on working holiday in osaka this autumn I heartily recommend taking the airport express at ifc. It's very easy. Once you're at the ifc exit where you can head straight for Queen's road central, enter ifc, pass the escalator in front of you and keep walking until you come to another escalator. Go down it, then left and go straight ahead. It's there. If you want to travel to Awaji from Osaka station, go through the gate, go down the escalator and look at the signs. You'll see which side is bound for Awaji. If you want to have a coffee at J.Cafe take the elevator to level three, go straight down the path and pass several shops until you come to an intersection. Turn right and it's there. If you want to take the elevator to a higher floor, turn left at the intersection, go past several shops till you see pure fitness, enter pure fitness and the lift is there. I thoroughly recommend climbing Mount Fuji which is off the beaten track, even though you aren't staying in Tokyo as the higher cost of traveling there is offset by the cheap admission. Climbing it is an arduous journey but the view is worth it. In fact my friend who's been there showed me her photos taken there by which I was awestruck. She said it was worth it for the view from the mountaintop and the confidence that she'd gained afterwards. At night even though two of the nearby lakes dry up, the remaining lakes reflect the beauty of the stars and Mount Fuji giving a double view of the starry sky and the mountains. You can even pitch camp there to get the best of the night sky.Sometimes it's nice to be away from the hustle and bustle of the city. Again the low admission fee offsets the rising transportation cost so it's definitely worth a visit.

I thoroughly recommend Ramen Manya near Osaka train station. They provide a range of broths to please sophisticated palates including pork bone broth, chicken broth, fish broth and spicy broth. The spicy broth is toned down to suit the palates of the tourists do you don't have to worry about it bring too spicy. Of course they too serve food adapted for their own palate. The richness of broths is outstanding which can tempt demanding palates. The noodle texture is perfect which will please the most refined palate. I highly recommend that you try this restaurant. Another restaurant which I heartily recommend is BBQ Fuji. They serve the highest quality meat in the city. You can choose any cuts of beef you like for barbecue such as flank, ribeye, sirloin, rump, t-bone, round, tenderloin and so on as I'm sure you have a discriminating palate. The meat texture is of top quality which will tempt sophisticated palates. The barbecue equipment is of high quality as the food doesn't stick to the grill. It's not like ordinary grills where you try to flip mest and it doesn't come loose. It sticks and tears, makes a mess and results in dry burnt meat. Their barbecue solved this problem. I certainly recommend you try this restaurant.

replies.msg:
今年第一期！
理由書 我用英文寫
大概有幾點：
．自我介紹 例如日本點樣伴你成長呀...
．點解要去日本working holiday...
．去到會做咩（最好有個行程表）
咁上下啦～
最好就加啲圖 (之前去日本自己影嘅相 或者 上網搵都得）
份理由書靚靚仔仔 吹下自己幾有熱誠就冇問題

我11月尾
諗住 住share house
巴打日文n 幾

replies.msg:
證書複印件ok
唔俾成績單（會考都冇去考過）
第一期6月公報名單
8月月尾前要拎到簽證
拎到簽證當日計3個月內要入境
我8月中拎
所以11月頭就出發
